txt.en: You have struck the Training Dummy with 'Savage Strikes'
As you gain levels, you acquire new skills to help you develop into a more powerful Brawler.

'I am here to help you learn about becoming a more powerful Brawler. As you gain levels, more skills will be available for you to unleash upon your foes.

'Use your new skill <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> against a training dummy.'

HINT:

Brawlers rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Mettle</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Low Strike</rgb>or <rgb=#00ff00>Dextrous Hook</rgb> to build <rgb=#ffff00>3 Mettle</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> skill.
Use your Overhand Smash skill on the Training Dummy ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Use your new skill <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> on the training dummy nearby.\n\nBrawlers rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Mettle</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Low Strike</rgb> or <rgb=#00ff00>Dextrous Hook</rgb> to build <rgb=#ffff00>3 Mettle</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> skill.
'Good, [placeholder]! I think you will be an excellent Brawler someday. You should return now to Elladan; I believe he wishes to begin the investigation.'
Naithador, the Brawler Trainer, is at the Edhelion Watch.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, return to your trainer and tell him of your success.

'Use your new skill to strike the Training Dummy.'

HINT:

Brawlers rely on <rgb=#ffff00>Mettle</rgb> to activate some of their skills such as <rgb=#00ff00>Overhand Smash</rgb>. Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Low Strike</rgb>or <rgb=#00ff00>Dextrous Hook</rgb> to build <rgb=#ffff00>3 Mettle</rgb> and then strike the <rgb=#ff0000>Training Dummy</rgb> with your <rgb=#ffff00>Overhand Smash</rgb> skill.
Learn the skill 'Savage Strikes' and use it against a Training Dummy
Talk to Naithador, the Brawler Trainer at the Edhelion Watch
Training: The Thrill of the Fight
